art_style: 16-bit Top-Down RPG Pixel Art. Vibrant colors, distinct tile boundaries, high contrast between safe zones (floor) and hazard zones (lava).
game_loop_mechanics: Player controls Hero via WASD. If Hero coordinates intersect with 'Hazard' mask (Lava) -> DESTROY Hero and RESPAWN at start. If Player submits command (e.g., 'Freeze Lava') -> TRIGGER VisionAgent to regenerate background with 'Ice' prompt -> TRIGGER NavigationAgent to re-bake Walkability Mask. If Hero coordinates intersect with 'Goal' (Chest) -> SPAWN Loot Item.
background_theme: Underground cavern. A wide, glowing river of magma separates a rocky starting ledge from a stone island containing a treasure chest.
rules_summary: A generative immersive sim puzzle. The player cannot cross the obstacle using standard movement. The objective is to use the 'Reality Editor' (text input) to chemically alter the obstacle (Lava -> Ice or Stone), changing its NavMesh properties from 'Blocked' to 'Walkable' to reach the chest.
